MultiSites.PluginDescription: View and compare all your websites and apps in this useful 'All Websites' dashboard.
MultiSites.TopLinkTooltip: Compare Web Analytics stats for all of your Websites.
MultiSites.SingleWebsitesDashboardDocumentation: This report gives you an overview for a specific website, containing the most important metrics.
MultiSites.AllWebsitesDashboardDocumentation: This report gives you an overview over all tracked websites, containing the most important metrics.
